name: Fngs Fr Th Mmrs
description:
Play as Trevor, a member of a group of friends who are throwing a house party on Halloween night.

Things get weird quick when the group finds themselves the unwitting recipients of a curse that quickly begins twisting their bodies to match their chosen costumes.

Trevor, having picked a Vampire costume at the last minute, is able to keep his wits about him enough to have a chance of saving everyone before the night is over.

Subdue each friend in three unique challenges to turn them back.

Three unique characters from a violent werewolf, an insane monster clown, and a lumbering and frightened cow. All fully voiced by a talented cast of actors.

----

Available for free for a limited time!

Windows and Mac only

Controls:
Arrow keys or mouse-click to move
Action button: Z, [spacebar], Enter
Cancel: X

Notes: This game was made for a game-jam and began on October 1rst, 2021, due to the time limits some features may not work properly. Please keep this in mind while playing.

Glitches and major bugs on the chopping block:

  • Werewolf friend can trap you in a few places causing a soft lock.
  • Low click response (some players experience no response when interacting with things that are interactable. (I tried to make everything interactable.)
  • Low click response with minigames (At the moment the minigames have reduced thresholds to ensure an easy enough win) a common issue with rpgmaker engine, might be able to see about cutting down on parallel processes to ease memory overload.

.:Check in later to find out where we placed after judging!:.
